column1: Sales and marketing includes the costs incurred for the selling activities (such as sales commissions
and amortization of capitalized sales commissions) and marketing activities related to our software
and cloud solutions and our service portfolio. For more information about the capitalization of costs
from contracts with customers, see Note (A.3).
General and administration includes the costs related to finance and administrative functions, human
resources, and general management as long as they are not directly attributable to one of the other
